Sentencas: The aim of this study is to exploit the waste heat of a biomass-based solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC)-model (a)-in a gas turbine (GT) to enhance the power generation/exergy efficiency (model (b)).
Titulo: Evolutionary based multi-criteria optimization of an integrated energy system with SOFC, gas turbine, and hydrogen production via electrolysis

Sentencas: Moreover, surplus power which is generated by the GT is transferred to a proton exchange membrane electrolyzer (PEME) for hydrogen production (model (c)).
Titulo: Evolutionary based multi-criteria optimization of an integrated energy system with SOFC, gas turbine, and hydrogen production via electrolysis

Sentencas: Parametric study is performed to investigate the influence of the effective parameters on performance and economic indicators.
Titulo: Evolutionary based multi-criteria optimization of an integrated energy system with SOFC, gas turbine, and hydrogen production via electrolysis

Sentencas: Eventually, considering exergy efficiency and total product cost as the objective functions, the proposed models are optimized by multi-objective optimization method based on genetic algorithm.
Titulo: Evolutionary based multi-criteria optimization of an integrated energy system with SOFC, gas turbine, and hydrogen production via electrolysis

Sentencas: Accordingly, the optimum solution points are gathered as Pareto frontiers and subsequently favorable solution points are ascertained from exergy/economic standpoints.
Titulo: Evolutionary based multi-criteria optimization of an integrated energy system with SOFC, gas turbine, and hydrogen production via electrolysis

Sentencas: Results of parametric study indicate that model (b) is the best model as it has higher exergy efficiency and lower total product cost.
Titulo: Evolutionary based multi-criteria optimization of an integrated energy system with SOFC, gas turbine, and hydrogen production via electrolysis

Sentencas: Moreover, model (c) may be a more suitable model compared to the model (a) because of higher exergy efficiency and capability of hydrogen production.
Titulo: Evolutionary based multi-criteria optimization of an integrated energy system with SOFC, gas turbine, and hydrogen production via electrolysis

Sentencas: The results further show that, at the best final solution point, the exergy efficiency and total product cost of the model (b) would be 33.22% and 19.01 $/GJ, respectively.
Titulo: Evolutionary based multi-criteria optimization of an integrated energy system with SOFC, gas turbine, and hydrogen production via electrolysis

Sentencas: Corresponding values of exergy efficiency and total product cost of the model (c) are 32.3% and 20.1 $/GJ.
Titulo: Evolutionary based multi-criteria optimization of an integrated energy system with SOFC, gas turbine, and hydrogen production via electrolysis

Sentencas: Moreover, the rate of hydrogen production of the model (c) is 8.393 kg/day, at the best solution point.
Titulo: Evolutionary based multi-criteria optimization of an integrated energy system with SOFC, gas turbine, and hydrogen production via electrolysis

Sentencas: Overall, the integration methods are promising techniques for increasing exergy efficiency, reducing total product cost and also for hydrogen production.
Titulo: Evolutionary based multi-criteria optimization of an integrated energy system with SOFC, gas turbine, and hydrogen production via electrolysis
